Package suncertify.db

These are the classes that provide database functionality to the data file.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DBAccess Interface DBAccess is a Data Access Interface
Classes which work with the database must implement this interface.
Finalizable Interface Finalizable must implemented by classes that have clean up functionality.
 

Class Summary
Data Class Data implements interface DBAccess provides methods to operate a database file on local hard drive.
DataAU Class DataAU extends Data class to implement auto-unlocking feature.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateKeyException A DuplicateKeyException is class of exception that must be thrown when newly created record in data file has the same unique key that another existing record has.
RecordNotFoundException A RecordNotFoundException is a class of exception that must be thrown when user wants to gain access to the record with number that does not exist in database file.
SecurityException A SecurityException class of exception that must be thrown when user tries to modify or delete record and uses invalid locking cookie.
 

Package suncertify.db Description

These are the classes that provide database functionality to the data file.

These classes provide the basic data creation, reading, updating and deleting functions required to process data in a database, as well as basic locking functionality.
